author: martinamalberti
body:
#### PR description:

This PR implements a fix in the Primary4DVertexHarvester class to save correctly all PID efficiency histograms when the [optionalPlots flag](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/Validation/MtdValidation/test/mtdValidation_cfg.py#L80)  is set to false in Primary4DVertexValidation.

#### PR validation:

The code was tested on 1000 MinBias events from dataset /RelValMinBias_14TeV/CMSSW_16_0_0_pre2-150X_mcRun4_realistic_v1_STD_RegeneratedGS_Run4D121_noPU-v1/GEN-SIM-RECO
It produces the expected histograms both with the optionalPlots flag set to True and False.
title: MTD Validation: fix for additional plots in Primary4DVertexHarvester
